price: الله شپه او ورځ (سره) اړوي بې شكه په دې كې د سترګورو لپاره يو (لوى) درس دى.
arabic: يُقَلِّبُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبۡرَةٗ لِّأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرِ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: yuqallibu al-lahu al-layla wal-nahāra inna fī dhālika laʿib'ratan li-ulī al-abṣāri
